quote: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
name: Colin Powell

quote: It's all about quality of life and finding a happy balance between work and friends and family.
name: Philip Green

quote: Success is the result of perfection, hard work, learning from failure, loyalty, and persistence.
name: Colin Powell

quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
name: Colin Powell

quote: Self-belief and hard work will always earn you success.
name: Virat Kohli

quote: Work like you don't need the money. Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like nobody's watching.
name: Satchel Paige

quote: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
name: Rumi

quote: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.
name: Newt Gingrich

quote: Without hard work, nothing grows but weeds.
name: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: Work hard, stay positive, and get up early. It's the best part of the day.
name: George Allen, Sr.

quote: There is no substitute for hard work. Never give up. Never stop believing. Never stop fighting.
name: Hope Hicks

quote: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
name: Unknown

quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
name: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Youth is the gift of nature, but age is a work of art.
name: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quote: Without hard work and discipline it is difficult to be a top professional.
name: Jahangir Khan

quote: Once you have commitment, you need the discipline and hard work to get you there.
name: Haile Gebrselassie

quote: Luck is great, but most of life is hard work.
name: Iain Duncan Smith

quote: Pleasure in the job puts perfection in the work.
name: Aristotle

quote: The fruit of your own hard work is the sweetest.
name: Deepika Padukone

quote: We are all born ignorant, but one must work hard to remain stupid.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Hard work without talent is a shame, but talent without hard work is a tragedy.
name: Robert Half

quote: Work hard, be kind, and amazing things will happen.
name: Conan O'Brien

quote: Do your work with your whole heart, and you will succeed - there's so little competition.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: I learned the value of hard work by working hard.
name: Margaret Mead

quote: Through hard work, perseverance and a faith in God, you can live your dreams.
name: Ben Carson

quote: When the best leader's work is done the people say, 'We did it ourselves.'
name: Lao Tzu

quote: There is no substitute for hard work.
name: Thomas A. Edison

quote: The best preparation for good work tomorrow is to do good work today.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: The true work of art is but a shadow of the divine perfection.
name: Michelangelo

quote: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work at hand. The sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
name: Alexander Graham Bell

quote: Opportunities are usually disguised as hard work, so most people don't recognize them.
name: Ann Landers

quote: Rest when you're weary. Refresh and renew yourself, your body, your mind, your spirit. Then get back to work.
name: Ralph Marston

quote: If you do what you love, you'll never work a day in your life.
name: Marc Anthony

quote: With hard work and effort, you can achieve anything.
name: Antoine Griezmann

quote: Our work is the presentation of our capabilities.
name: Edward Gibbon

quote: The reward for work well done is the opportunity to do more.
name: Jonas Salk

quote: You have to fight to reach your dream. You have to sacrifice and work hard for it.
name: Lionel Messi

quote: A gentle word, a kind look, a good-natured smile can work wonders and accomplish miracles.
name: William Hazlitt

quote: The beginning is the most important part of the work.
name: Plato

quote: Life is tough, and things don't always work out well, but we should be brave and go on with our lives.
name: Suga

quote: I've had to learn to fight all my life - got to learn to keep smiling. If you smile things will work out.
name: Serena Williams

quote: I put my heart and my soul into my work, and have lost my mind in the process.
name: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Thinking is the hardest work there is, which is probably the reason why so few engage in it.
name: Henry Ford

quote: Quality is everyone's responsibility.
name: W. Edwards Deming

quote: You see, God helps only people who work hard. That principle is very clear.
name: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: There is simply no substitute for hard work when it comes to achieving success.
name: Heather Bresch

quote: I love it when people doubt me. It makes me work harder to prove them wrong.
name: Derek Jeter

quote: In fitness, there are no short cuts. It involves immense discipline and hard work.
name: Mahesh Babu

quote: Nothing ever comes to one, that is worth having, except as a result of hard work.
name: Booker T. Washington

quote: I never expect to see a perfect work from an imperfect man.
name: Alexander Hamilton

quote: Work out your own salvation. Do not depend on others.
name: Buddha

quote: When love and skill work together, expect a masterpiece.
name: John Ruskin

quote: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
name: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Don't work for recognition, but do work worthy of recognition.
name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Education must not simply teach work - it must teach Life.
name: W. E. B. Du Bois

quote: I'm so not stylish by nature, but I've learned to work with what I have.
name: Julie Bowen

quote: Live and work but do not forget to play, to have fun in life and really enjoy it.
name: Eileen Caddy

quote: If you work hard and you do your best, you can do anything.
name: Erin Heatherton

quote: Far and away the best prize that life has to offer is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.
name: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Create like a god, command like a king, work like a slave.
name: Constantin Brancusi

quote: Our fatigue is often caused not by work, but by worry, frustration and resentment.
name: Dale Carnegie

quote: You only do good work when you're taking risks and pushing yourself.
name: Sally Hawkins

quote: Pray as though everything depended on God. Work as though everything depended on you.
name: Saint Augustine

quote: If you want to become a great chef, you have to work with great chefs. And that's exactly what I did.
name: Gordon Ramsay

quote: Creativity is a habit, and the best creativity is the result of good work habits.
name: Twyla Tharp

quote: The one way to get me to work my hardest was to doubt me.
name: Michelle Obama

quote: I can only control myself, my actions, my work ethic, and my attitude.
name: Ali Krieger

quote: To be happy, it first takes being comfortable being in your own shoes. The rest can work up from there.
name: Sophia Bush

quote: If you have a dream, it's definitely achievable through hard work, through dedication, sacrifice, everything.
name: Carli Lloyd

quote: Great companies are built in the office, with hard work put in by a team.
name: Emily Chang

quote: Work hard. Through determination and self-focus and discipline, you can accomplish anything.
name: Kimberly Guilfoyle

quote: Quality is pride of workmanship.
name: W. Edwards Deming

quote: The power of one, if fearless and focused, is formidable, but the power of many working together is better.
name: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo

quote: Thunder is good, thunder is impressive; but it is lightning that does the work.
name: Mark Twain

quote: Nothing will work unless you do.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: Just be yourself. Be honest, work towards a goal, and you'll achieve it.
name: Emraan Hashmi

quote: Simplicity and repose are the qualities that measure the true value of any work of art.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Wishing to be friends is quick work, but friendship is a slow ripening fruit.
name: Aristotle

quote: There is a saying that every nice piece of work needs the right person in the right place at the right time.
name: Benoit Mandelbrot

quote: Four things for success: work and pray, think and believe.
name: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Colleagues are a wonderful thing - but mentors, that's where the real work gets done.
name: Junot Diaz

quote: Formula for success: rise early, work hard, strike oil.
name: J. Paul Getty

quote: I've got a theory that if you give 100% all of the time, somehow things will work out in the end.
name: Larry Bird

quote: There is no higher religion than human service. To work for the common good is the greatest creed.
name: Woodrow Wilson

quote: Unemployment is capitalism's way of getting you to plant a garden.
name: Orson Scott Card

quote: Tell the truth, work hard, and come to dinner on time.
name: Gerald R. Ford

quote: Never lose the childlike wonder. Show gratitude... Don't complain; just work harder... Never give up.
name: Randy Pausch

quote: Don't worry about being a star, worry about doing good work, and all that will come to you.
name: Ice Cube

quote: All wealth is the product of labor.
name: John Locke

quote: Football taught me how hard you had to work to achieve something.
name: Kenny Chesney

quote: Enjoy your sweat because hard work doesn't guarantee success, but without it you don't have a chance.
name: Alex Rodriguez

quote: I believe in stopping work and eating lunch.
name: L'Wren Scott

quote: I've always believed that if you put in the work, the results will come.
name: Michael Jordan

quote: Derive happiness in oneself from a good day's work, from illuminating the fog that surrounds us.
name: Henri Matisse

quote: Effective networking isn't a result of luck - it requires hard work and persistence.
name: Lewis Howes

quote: I feel like a tiger right now. There's nothing impossible if you get up and work for it.
name: Michael Flatley

quote: When you go all over the world for work, your dream vacation is your bedroom.
name: Jack Antonoff

quote: We are infected by our own misunderstanding of how our own minds work.
name: Kevin Kelly

quote: Glory is attained from hard work, step by step.
name: Ma Long

quote: I'm thankful because all the hard work and sacrifices were worth it in the end.
name: WizKid

quote: Management is nothing more than motivating other people.
name: Lee Iacocca

quote: Live your life, do your work, then take your hat.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The miracle is not that we do this work, but that we are happy to do it.
name: Mother Teresa

quote: Luck is a dividend of sweat. The more you sweat, the luckier you get.
name: Ray Kroc

quote: Some of our finest work comes through service to others.
name: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: Financial freedom is available to those who learn about it and work for it.
name: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: Play is the work of childhood.
name: Jean Piaget

quote: I have no idols. I admire work, dedication and competence.
name: Ayrton Senna

quote: What you are will show in what you do.
name: Thomas A. Edison

quote: It is the working man who is the happy man. It is the idle man who is the miserable man.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.
name: Vince Lombardi

quote: Work, look for peace and calm in work: you will find it nowhere else.
name: Dmitri Mendeleev

quote: Economics is extremely useful as a form of employment for economists.
name: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: God Bless my mother and father for all the hard work they've done for our family.
name: Coy Bowles

quote: I'm not a 'sexy' 'beautiful' woman. It takes a lot of work to make me look like a girl.
name: Megan Fox

quote: Be glad of life because it gives you the chance to love, to work, to play, and to look up at the stars.
name: Henry Van Dyke

quote: One must work and dare if one really wants to live.
name: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Work as though you would live forever, and live as though you would die today. Go another mile!
name: Og Mandino

quote: I realize that every picture isn't a work of art.
name: Conrad Hall

quote: Laziness may appear attractive, but work gives satisfaction.
name: Anne Frank

quote: To find out what one is fitted to do, and to secure an opportunity to do it, is the key to happiness.
name: John Dewey

quote: Work harder on yourself than you do on your job.
name: Jim Rohn

quote: When you are a photographer, you work all the time, because your eye is the first camera.
name: Patrick Demarchelier

quote: It's the best feeling when you wake up and it's warm and cozy, and you don't have to go to work.
name: Emmy Rossum

quote: Through hard work and education, we can deliver a strong economy and opportunity for all.
name: Julia Gillard

quote: A bachelor is a man who comes to work each morning from a different direction.
name: Sholom Aleichem

quote: Where the spirit does not work with the hand, there is no art.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: If God can work through me, he can work through anyone.
name: Francis of Assisi

quote: Work gives you meaning and purpose and life is empty without it.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: Every training session, I work hard to improve my weaknesses and build on my strengths.
name: Antoine Griezmann

quote: The human foot is a masterpiece of engineering and a work of art.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Everyone's dream can come true if you just stick to it and work hard.
name: Serena Williams

quote: The supreme accomplishment is to blur the line between work and play.
name: Arnold J. Toynbee

quote: I think anyone can do anything they dream of if they put their mind to it and put in the work.
name: Shawn Mendes

quote: Be different, stand out, and work your butt off.
name: Reba McEntire

quote: Persistence and resilience only come from having been given the chance to work though difficult problems.
name: Gever Tulley

quote: We must fight terrorism as if there's no peace process and work to achieve peace as if there's no terror.
name: Yitzhak Rabin

quote: All things are difficult before they are easy.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: Human rights must work to uplift human dignity.
name: Rodrigo Duterte

quote: You can control two things: your work ethic and your attitude about anything.
name: Ali Krieger

quote: There's only one growth strategy: work hard.
name: William Hague

quote: A beautiful lady is an accident of nature. A beautiful old lady is a work of art.
name: Louis Nizer

quote: My work is like my vacation, so in a way every day is like Saturday.
name: Ludacris

quote: Work harder than anybody you've ever seen. That's what I believe.
name: Meek Mill

quote: The greatest education in the world is watching the masters at work.
name: Michael Jackson

quote: When you see validation for a life's work and dedication, it's a beautiful day.
name: Mary Gauthier

quote: I believe there are two periods in life, one for the bike, the other for becoming active on one's work.
name: Bernard Hinault

quote: I enjoy the work, I enjoy every minute of my professional life.
name: Jose Mourinho

quote: Everyone has been made for some particular work, and the desire for that work has been put in every heart.
name: Rumi

quote: Keep doing some kind of work, that the devil may always find you employed.
name: St. Jerome

quote: In the city, we work until quitting time. On the farm, we work until the job is finished.
name: John Bytheway

quote: I grew up in an immigrant neighborhood. We just knew the rule was you're going to have to work twice as hard.
name: Lin-Manuel Miranda

quote: Power means happiness; power means hard work and sacrifice.
name: Beyonce Knowles

quote: It's a lot easier to do good work when you have good words to say and work with good people.
name: Mark Harmon

quote: Organizing is what you do before you do something, so that when you do it, it is not all mixed up.
name: A. A. Milne

quote: The highest reward that God gives us for good work is the ability to do better work.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Across professions, consistency is a direct product of work ethic.
name: Harsha Bhogle

quote: The automobile engine will come, and then I will consider my life's work complete.
name: Rudolf Diesel

quote: I like the cold weather. It means you get work done.
name: Noam Chomsky

quote: People might not get all they work for in this world, but they must certainly work for all they get.
name: Frederick Douglass

quote: As information technology restructures the work situation, it abstracts thought from action.
name: Shoshana Zuboff

quote: I really like doing good work and working with good people - that's the thing that drives me.
name: Giles Deacon

quote: Journalism is what we need to make democracy work.
name: Walter Cronkite

quote: You reach a point where you don't work for money.
name: Walt Disney

quote: Success for an athlete follows many years of hard work and dedication.
name: Michael Diamond

quote: When more and more people are thrown out of work, unemployment results.
name: Calvin Coolidge

quote: Our environment, the world in which we live and work, is a mirror of our attitudes and expectations.
name: Earl Nightingale

quote: If you continue to work hard, let that be the fuel to your fire.
name: Pitbull

quote: Any product that needs a manual to work is broken.
name: Elon Musk

quote: Bring diversity back to agriculture. That's what made it work in the first place.
name: David R. Brower

quote: Can anything be sadder than work left unfinished? Yes, work never begun.
name: Christina Rossetti

quote: Let there be work, bread, water and salt for all.
name: Nelson Mandela

quote: Plan your work for today and every day, then work your plan.
name: Margaret Thatcher

quote: He who seeks rest finds boredom. He who seeks work finds rest.
name: Dylan Thomas

quote: This has always been a motto of mine: Attempt the impossible in order to improve your work.
name: Bette Davis

quote: Many people mistake our work for our vocation. Our vocation is the love of Jesus.
name: Mother Teresa

quote: I have been up against tough competition all my life. I wouldn't know how to get along without it.
name: Walt Disney

quote: I try to work and enjoy life, and that's about all.
name: Curtis Armstrong

quote: To find joy in work is to discover the fountain of youth.
name: Pearl S. Buck

quote: I believe when you meet the right person it clicks, and you both know and you start making it work, you know?
name: Hunter Hayes

quote: Live like you'll die tomorrow, work like you don't need the money, and dance like nobody's watching.
name: Bob Fosse

quote: I think it all comes down to motivation. If you really want to do something, you will work hard for it.
name: Edmund Hillary

quote: When you form a team, why do you try to form a team? Because teamwork builds trust and trust builds speed.
name: Russel Honore

quote: Deprived of meaningful work, men and women lose their reason for existence; they go stark, raving mad.
name: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote: The productivity of work is not the responsibility of the worker but of the manager.
name: Peter Drucker

quote: In the end it's about the work, not an award you get for the work.
name: Linda Fiorentino

quote: No fine work can be done without concentration and self-sacrifice and toil and doubt.
name: Max Beerbohm

quote: The best way to learn is by doing. The only way to build a strong work ethic is getting your hands dirty.
name: Alex Spanos

quote: In the name of God, stop a moment, cease your work, look around you.
name: Leo Tolstoy

quote: I believe that the best cameraman is one who recognizes the source, the story, as the basis of his work.
name: James Wong Howe

quote: You don't really work for awards, but when they come it's... nice.
name: Pierfrancesco Favino

quote: I don't have a good work ethic. I have a real casual relationship with hours.
name: Janeane Garofalo

quote: O man you are busy working for the world, and the world is busy trying to turn you out.
name: Abu Bakr

quote: The Internet will change the way we work, live, learn, and play.
name: John T. Chambers

quote: Working hard and working smart sometimes can be two different things.
name: Byron Dorgan

quote: If you must have motivation, think of your paycheck on Friday.
name: Noel Coward

quote: By working faithfully eight hours a day you may eventually get to be boss and work twelve hours a day.
name: Robert Frost

quote: Doing stunt work is risky, but it's something I enjoy.
name: Verne Troyer

quote: Most people work just hard enough not to get fired and get paid just enough money not to quit.
name: George Carlin

quote: One machine can do the work of fifty ordinary men. No machine can do the work of one extraordinary man.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: I never did a day's work in my life. It was all fun.
name: Thomas A. Edison

quote: When you fail you learn from the mistakes you made and it motivates you to work even harder.
name: Natalie Gulbis

quote: Few ideas work on the first try. Iteration is key to innovation.
name: Sebastian Thrun

quote: It's important for a woman to feel good in her clothes. It's OK to have curves and to work them.
name: Nicole Scherzinger

quote: Many hands make light work.
name: John Heywood

quote: It is impossible to work in information technology without also engaging in social engineering.
name: Jaron Lanier

quote: Know what it is that drives you - motivates you - and pursue it. Endeavor to work to make it happen.
name: Peggy Whitson

quote: For every two minutes of glamour, there are eight hours of hard work.
name: Jessica Savitch

quote: I never did anything by accident, nor did any of my inventions come by accident; they came by work.
name: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Poor people are those who only work to try to keep an expensive lifestyle and always want more and more.
name: Jose Mujica

quote: What you want is the opportunity to work and an audience. Prizes after that are just a great big bonus.
name: Kenneth Branagh

quote: Don't stay in bed, unless you can make money in bed.
name: George Burns

quote: It's not an experiment if you know it's going to work.
name: Jeff Bezos

quote: I think when you work really hard and you help others, God helps you get what you want.
name: Gina Rodriguez

quote: When I hear people boo, that just makes me want to go out there and work harder.
name: John Cena

quote: Stay humble, be fearless, and work, work, work, work, work, work.
name: Daya

quote: Join the union, girls, and together say Equal Pay for Equal Work.
name: Susan B. Anthony

quote: Keep up the good work, if only for a while, if only for the twinkling of a tiny galaxy.
name: Wislawa Szymborska

quote: It's important to work hard, stay humble, and not let the criticism or the compliments go to your head.
name: Jessica Sanchez

quote: A guilty conscience needs to confess. A work of art is a confession.
name: Albert Camus

quote: Good leadership consists of showing average people how to do the work of superior people.
name: John D. Rockefeller

quote: For me, real life is hard work. Making movies is like a vacation for my soul.
name: Guillermo del Toro

quote: No one can come and claim ownership of my work. I am the creator of it, and it lives within me.
name: Prince

quote: A big part of filmmaking is gathering a group of people you can work with.
name: Lenny Abrahamson

quote: Only true love can fuel the hard work that awaits you.
name: Tom Freston

quote: I give thanks everyday that I've been able to take my craziness and make it work for me.
name: Fritz Scholder

quote: We teachers can only help the work going on, as servants wait upon a master.
name: Maria Montessori

quote: Death is pitch-dark, but colors are light. To be a painter, one must work with rays of light.
name: Edvard Munch

quote: I am blessed to be able to work at a job I love and also give back in the most vital way - to people in need.
name: Teri Hatcher

quote: When you're good-looking, I think you usually don't have to work as hard.
name: Butch Trucks

quote: I don't work at being ordinary.
name: Paul McCartney

quote: I was just excited to have challenging work to do and smart people to work with.
name: Katherine Johnson

quote: Work, apart from devotion or love of God, is helpless and cannot stand alone.
name: Ramakrishna

quote: If you work hard and you work for somebody who empowers you and challenges you, you'll be successful.
name: Hope Hicks

quote: Work is not man's punishment. It is his reward and his strength and his pleasure.
name: George Sand

quote: Sometimes you just have to calm down a little bit and let the system work itself.
name: Blake Griffin

quote: I'm very lucky because my eyes work with almost any hair color. Thanks for the genetics, parents.
name: Frances Bean Cobain

quote: Making better choices takes work. There is a daily give and take, but it is worth the effort.
name: Tom Rath

quote: Emotional self-control is the result of hard work, not an inherent skill.
name: Travis Bradberry

quote: To be a poet is a condition, not a profession.
name: Robert Frost

quote: Be regular and orderly in your life, so that you may be violent and original in your work.
name: Gustave Flaubert

quote: I have had lots of luck in my career but there has also been a lot of hard work.
name: Maria Sharapova

quote: The end of labor is to gain leisure.
name: Aristotle

quote: Good things happen to those who hustle.
name: Chuck Noll

quote: It is easy to make promises - it is hard work to keep them.
name: Boris Johnson

quote: Work is the meat of life, pleasure the dessert.
name: B. C. Forbes

quote: Love and work... work and love, that's all there is.
name: Sigmund Freud

quote: A beautiful body perishes, but a work of art dies not.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: That was my way of getting through difficult times of low confidence - hard work.
name: David Beckham

quote: There is a kind of victory in good work, no matter how humble.
name: Jack Kemp

quote: If ballots won't work, bullets will.
name: Malcolm X

quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is to do today's work superbly well.
name: William Osler

quote: There is joy in work. There is no happiness except in the realization that we have accomplished something.
name: Henry Ford

quote: I love going to work out now. It gets out aggression and my trainer really shakes it up so I don't get bored.
name: Adriana Lima

quote: Unraveling external selves and coming home to our real identity is the true meaning of soul work.
name: Sue Monk Kidd

quote: The only time some people work like a horse is when the boss rides them.
name: Gabriel Heatter

quote: When you think about your heritage, you think about toughness and hard work.
name: Jeff Garcia

quote: The older you get, the better you have to look, the higher you have to kick, the harder you have to work.
name: Salman Khan

quote: You can't get much done in life if you only work on the days when you feel good.
name: Jerry West

quote: At one point I took on a new job, and I just didn't have time to do anything but work.
name: Sharon Olds

quote: It's not about my career now. It's just about finding great work and having a good time.
name: Melanie Griffith

quote: Dancers are a work of art - they are the canvas on which their work is painted.
name: Patrick Duffy

quote: Gentleness doesn't get work done unless you happen to be a hen laying eggs.
name: Coco Chanel

quote: Every noble work is at first impossible.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Men for the sake of getting a living forget to live.
name: Margaret Fuller

quote: The harder I work, the luckier I get.
name: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: No one can arrive from being talented alone, work transforms talent into genius.
name: Anna Pavlova

quote: There are one hundred men seeking security to one able man who is willing to risk his fortune.
name: J. Paul Getty

quote: We've just got to keep going. More. More work, more action, more results.
name: Gina Raimondo

quote: Work expands so as to fill the time available for its completion.
name: C. Northcote Parkinson

quote: I have found in work that you only get back what you put into it, but it does come back gift-wrapped.
name: Joyce Brothers

quote: Most of what we call management consists of making it difficult for people to get their work done.
name: Peter Drucker

quote: Work is accomplished by those employees who have not yet reached their level of incompetence.
name: Laurence J. Peter

quote: When a man tells you that he got rich through hard work, ask him: 'Whose?'
name: Don Marquis

quote: Work is a necessary evil to be avoided.
name: Mark Twain

quote: The artist is nothing without the gift, but the gift is nothing without work.
name: Emile Zola

quote: If you work for it, you'll deserve what comes. Hard work.
name: DeMar DeRozan

quote: I believe that anyone can be what they want to be; it just comes down to hard work.
name: Kiesza

quote: Do not hire a man who does your work for money, but him who does it for love of it.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I guess we all like to be recognized not for one piece of fireworks, but for the ledger of our daily work.
name: Neil Armstrong

quote: Watch every detail that affects the accuracy of your work.
name: Arthur C. Nielsen

quote: Big jobs usually go to the men who prove their ability to outgrow small ones.
name: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: My experience has been that work is almost the best way to pull oneself out of the depths.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Work is the curse of the drinking classes.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: The more I want to get something done, the less I call it work.
name: Richard Bach

quote: Plans are only good intentions unless they immediately degenerate into hard work.
name: Peter Drucker

quote: Every great work makes the human face more admirable and richer, and that is its whole secret.
name: Albert Camus

quote: Our work is never over.
name: Kanye West

quote: I have offended God and mankind because my work didn't reach the quality it should have.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: The pay is good and I can walk to work.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: Without work, all life goes rotten. But when work is soulless, life stifles and dies.
name: Albert Camus

quote: The only thing that overcomes hard luck is hard work.
name: Harry Golden

quote: If you have fun and keep a good attitude, people want to work with you.
name: James Marsden

quote: Patience can't be acquired overnight. It is just like building up a muscle. Every day you need to work on it.
name: Eknath Easwaran

quote: Nobody ever drowned in his own sweat.
name: Ann Landers

quote: It is better to imitate ancient than modern work.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: There's a lot that's out of your control. But the one thing that you can control is your work ethic.
name: Christen Press

quote: Find a job you like and you add five days to every week.
name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Differences among deaf people are okay, but we need to recognize those differences and work together.
name: I. King Jordan

quote: If you will work in co-operation, forgetting the past, burying the hatchet, you are bound to succeed.
name: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quote: A work of art is a world in itself reflecting senses and emotions of the artist's world.
name: Hans Hofmann

quote: Labor gives birth to ideas.
name: Jim Rohn

quote: Old age is not a matter for sorrow. It is matter for thanks if we have left our work done behind us.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: So much of what we call management consists in making it difficult for people to work.
name: Peter Drucker

quote: Without labor nothing prospers.
name: Sophocles

quote: Big pay and little responsibility are circumstances seldom found together.
name: Napoleon Hill

quote: We work to become, not to acquire.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: The hard work definitely paid off and hard work always does.
name: Gabby Douglas

quote: It is your work in life that is the ultimate seduction.
name: Pablo Picasso

quote: The idea of having a steady job is appealing.
name: Robin Williams

quote: Too much work, too much vacation, too much of any one thing is unsound.
name: Walter Annenberg

quote: Work is a necessity for man. Man invented the alarm clock.
name: Pablo Picasso

quote: If a guy doesn't work hard and doesn't play well, he can't lead anything. All he is, is a talker.
name: John Madden

quote: Work will win when wishy washy wishing won t.
name: Thomas S. Monson

quote: A manager is responsible for the application and performance of knowledge.
name: Peter Drucker

quote: I see a future where getting to work or to school or to the store does not have to cause pollution.
name: Bernie Sanders

quote: Give yourself something to work toward - constantly.
name: Mary Kay Ash

quote: A writer wants something more than money for his work: he wants permanence.
name: A. A. Milne

quote: No person who is enthusiastic about his work has anything to fear from life.
name: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: I'd like to dial it back 5% or 10% and try to have a vacation that's not just e-mail with a view.
name: Elon Musk

quote: Lawyers work hard and, like us, they're human, many of them.
name: Dick Cavett

quote: Working hard is very important. You're not going to get anywhere without working extremely hard.
name: George Lucas

quote: A family needs to work as a team, supporting each other's individual aims and aspirations.
name: Buzz Aldrin

quote: It is only when I am doing my work that I feel truly alive.
name: Federico Fellini

quote: Honor lies in honest toil.
name: Grover Cleveland

quote: Obviously, a long-distance relationship is hard. But, like anything worth having, you make it work.
name: Leona Lewis

quote: I've got a woman's ability to stick to a job and get on with it when everyone else walks off and leaves it.
name: Margaret Thatcher

quote: Blessed is he who has found his work; let him ask no other blessedness.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Work is much more fun than fun.
name: Noel Coward

quote: Teaching was the hardest work I had ever done, and it remains the hardest work I have done to date.
name: Ann Richards

quote: Ya gots to work with what you gots to work with.
name: Stevie Wonder

quote: Work alone is noble.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: The harder you work... and visualize something, the luckier you get.
name: Seal

quote: Management must manage!
name: Harold S. Geneen

quote: The only way to enjoy anything in this life is to earn it first.
name: Ginger Rogers

quote: Life grants nothing to us mortals without hard work.
name: Horace

quote: We have a system that increasingly taxes work and subsidizes nonwork.
name: Milton Friedman

quote: By the work one knows the workman.
name: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: There is no disgrace in working. There was no silver spoon around at the time I was born.
name: Anna Held

quote: If Botticelli were alive today he'd be working for Vogue.
name: Peter Ustinov

quote: Work isn't to make money; you work to justify life.
name: Marc Chagall

quote: Honest labor bears a lovely face.
name: Thomas Dekker

quote: Inspiration comes of working every day.
name: Charles Baudelaire

quote: You're blessed if you have the strength to work.
name: Mahalia Jackson

quote: I work to stay alive.
name: Bette Davis

quote: My husband changed jobs so fast that I simply never knew what business he was in.
name: Rose Kennedy

quote: The greatest teacher I know is the job itself.
name: James Cash Penney

quote: If you don't want to work you have to work to earn enough money so that you won't have to work.
name: Ogden Nash

quote: Concentrate on your job and you will forget your other troubles.
name: William Feather

quote: I think about my work every minute of the day.
name: Jeff Koons

quote: I work 338 days a year, 16 hours a day.
name: Dave Pelzer

quote: One thing I never want to be accused of is not working.
name: Don Shula

quote: Most people treat the office manual the way they treat a software manual. They never look at it.
name: James Levine

quote: Nothing is work unless you'd rather be doing something else.
name: George Halas

quote: The will to work of everyone in the country is the best guarantee of national survival.
name: Bhumibol Adulyadej

quote: One man's wage increase is another man's price increase.
name: Harold Wilson

quote: Careers, like rockets, don't always take off on time. The trick is to always keep the engine running.
name: Gary Sinise

quote: When your work speaks for itself, don't interrupt.
name: Henry J. Kaiser

quote: Be open to the amazing changes which are occurring in the field that interest you.
name: Leigh Steinberg

quote: Every man loves what he is good at.
name: Thomas Shadwell

quote: Anyone who can walk to the welfare office can walk to work.
name: Al Capp

quote: There's something to be said in favor of working in isolation in the real world.
name: A. R. Ammons

quote: I always got my work done before playing.
name: Edwin Moses

quote: Work is a prayer. And I start off every morning dedicating it to our Creator.
name: Joseph Murray

quote: I'm working myself to death.
name: Alan Ladd

quote: After two weeks of working on a project, you know whether it will work or not.
name: Bill Budge

quote: I can't imagine anything more worthwhile than doing what I most love. And they pay me for it.
name: Edgar Winter

quote: As I understand it, sport is hard work for which you do not get paid.
name: Irvin S. Cobb

quote: I met an American woman and got married so I had to get a job.
name: Walter Wager
